title: MWM Affair - Discreet and Ongoing
text:
I know there are a lot of us out there, and I'm hoping to find someone who's thinking along the same lines as me, where there's a mutual connection that satisfies what we're both missing.

Ideally, I'm looking for a situation where we're both married (to a woman or man, doesn't matter), or otherwise committed to someone, but need something more. If I've caught your attention, please read on.

No judgments here and I appreciate the same. The fact of the matter is, there's a lot of guys hooking up on the side. We all have our unique situations and our reasons. I've done the meaningless hookup sex thing and it does temporarily satisfy a certain itch, but over the years I've come to realize I want something more - a secret, discreet, loving, intimate and genuine affair with a man.

If you're like me, you've had some encounters on the side, and once in a blue moon you feel a certain connection, or spark. And that wistful longing that you wish it could be, with that one guy, more than a hurried tumble. 

It is my sincere desire to find someone where that mutual spark flares. Where a mutual trust can develop that we will respect each other's privacy and primary relationships. Maybe we meet once a week. I want to find a passionate and exciting guy to share a little time with. Maybe for years. 

And believe me, I completely understand that you're married (or whatever) and will never leave your partner. . .I get that. That's perfect. I know this is like hunting for a needle in a haystack. But if you understand what I'm attempting (and probably failing at!) to articulate and get where I'm coming from, let's chat.

Ideally, I'm looking for someone roughly my age. If you're younger, be mature enough to really understand what this is. 

I have no preconceived notions and no wildly unrealistic standards that have to be met. I find myself attracted to all shapes and sizes of guys. It really depends on chemistry. I'm more than happy to trade some pictures, including (eventually) face pictures. I understand that mutual attraction is pretty important with this. I also (very) fully understand the need for discretion, so we can work all that out. I'm a very caring and laid back guy, equally comfortable with digging ditches or leading meetings in the board room.
